[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/lending.move] [Function: deposit_on_behalf_of_user()] [Authorization] Can deposit_on_behalf_of_user() at line 555 be exploited to deposit minimal amounts to many users, causing storage bloat or accounting issues? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/lending.move] [Function: deposit_on_behalf_of_user()] [Dust Attack] Can deposit_on_behalf_of_user() be used to deposit dust amounts to many addresses, causing gas exhaustion for legitimate users? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/lending.move] [Function: repay_on_behalf_of_user()] [Excess Handling] If repay_on_behalf_of_user() returns excess balance at line 579, who receives it - the caller or the user whose debt was repaid? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/lending.move] [Function: deposit_on_behalf_of_user()] [Friend Restriction] Why is deposit_on_behalf_of_user() marked public(friend) - can this restriction be bypassed through other public entry points? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/lending.move] [Function: base_withdraw()] [Oracle Required] Why does base_withdraw() require oracle at line 218 but base_deposit() doesn't - can this asymmetry be exploited? (Medium)
